attributes.action: Kurdish people's petition against Dan Pringle Kshop Movie sweeney todd inspired movie
attributes.additional_details:
It's a movie made by Dan Pringle and his Turkish companion, it's about young Kurdish-Iraqi student "Salar" he starts a killing spree and makes a kebab from young English students bodies!!!
We are Kurds of Bournemouth condemn this movie and refuse that our identity to be used in a such gross commercial project!!!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/danpringle/k-shop-a-sweeney-todd-inspired-movie
